name: angularjs-dev-wrapper
description: This starter project aims to wrap angularjs in an angular2+ development workflow and syntax.

scripts.start: npm run compile && npm run serve
scripts.compile:dev: npm run pack:templates && npm run pack:stylesheets && bash ./node_modules/.bin/tsc -p tsconfig.dev.json
scripts.compile:prod: npm run pack:templates && npm run pack:stylesheets && bash ./node_modules/.bin/tsc -p tsconfig.prod.json

author: Ryan Conklin
